content: I no longer seem to be able to modify the labels on issues, or close issues, etc.
is anyone else having these problems?
still able to modify stuff in rust-lang/rust
are you sure you’re looking at the right repo?
@varkor yep same problem
I seem to be able to.
@varkor it's my fault, I will fix
same @scalexm
maybe i'll just restore the old setup
er, wait, @varkor -- I'm not sure what's up with you :) where did you lose permissions to?
rust-lang/rust?
er, ok, should be fixed now
I still want to rationalize our GH team setup but it'll wait for another day, sorry for the inconvenience
yep, thanks — that's fixed now!
did you remove permissions for the #wg-traits team or something, and GH didn't take into account any other teams when updating the permissions...?
Ah this explains why I suddenly got subscribed to the rust repo
Ohh, this explains what opened a flood gate between rust-lang/rust and my mailbox...
now you will all learn our pain
no, now we disable notifications for the repo :P
Ah, the pain of silence and isolation
The joy of solitude you mean :D
yea :D I immediately turned them off again. Pings for teams or users suffice I think

Ha, I still have notifications from rust-lang/rust enabled.
This way you catch all the interesting stuff.
Most of notifications are not interesting, but this is usually obvious from the title, so you don't even have to read them.
This way I can also freely ignore pings from non-interesting issues because they are lost in the noise :)
